General.Description: OmiseGO is a network built on the Ethereum platform with the Proof of Stake algorithm to provide the infrastructure as well as to facilitate the processing of distributed payments from e-wallet operators such as Alipay and Venmo. OmiseGO is building exchanges, payment mechanisms, clearing network and blockchain access portal powered by assets. OmiseGO is not owned by any party. Instead, it is an open distribution network of validators that enforce the behavior of all participants. Besides, it uses the mechanism of a protocol token to generate a demonstration blockchain of shares to enable execution of market operations among the participants.
General.Features: We can list some powerful features of OMG coin. First, Access: No Bank Account Needed; Nationally-Licensed Full Reserves. Second, Scalability: Instant Settlement; Low Cost. Finally, Security: Decentralized Currencies and Decentralized Fiat Token Custody.
General.Technology: OmiseGO is a public financial technology that is based on the public Ethereum for use in mainstream e-wallets, allowing real-time peer-to-peer payment and exchange services and payment services. The balance between the jurisdictions and the cement of the organization, both monetary and foreign-decentralized. Designed to enable financial inclusion and disrupt existing organizations, the access will be provided to everyone through the OmiseGO network and digital wallet framework.
General.Sponsor: OmiseGO is invested by Investment, SMBC, AscendCapital, SMDV, Golden Gate Ventures, LastVenturer, and 500 startups.
